title: Inkline Tri-Stringer
paragraphs: The Inkline Tri-Stringer is a main weapon in Splatoon 3. It is an Inkline-branded version of the Tri-Stringer.

The Inkline Tri-Stringer mostly shares its appearance with the Tri-Stringer, except that the fishing rod is made out of a different material and has the Inkline logo emblazoned on one side. The nozzles and the center tube's cap are also colored olive green instead of black.
The Inkline Tri-Stringer became available on 1 September 2023 at 00:00 UTC. It comes in a set with the Sprinkler and Super Chump.
- The Tableturf Battle card icon of the Inkline Tri-Stringer.

For competitive tips about the Inkline Tri-Stringer
- The Inkline Tri-Stringer is the second weapon with the Inkline branding, after the Tenta Sorella Brella.

- Contrary to its final name, the Inkline Tri-Stringer was initially labeled as the 'Tri-Stringer Collab' on its Tableturf Battle card in the Drizzle Season 2023 trailer[3] (a naming convention sometimes used generically for collaborative weapon variants in other languages). Whether this naming was in error or simply a placeholder is unknown.
- If weapons from Splatoon 2's Kensa Collection are excluded, the Inkline Tri-Stringer is the only weapon with gear branding to not be made by the Splat brand.
